dcterms:description: The IWSLT dataset is used for English-pivot translation, retaining parallel sentences from/to English, and includes a chain of pivots connecting multiple languages.
dcterms:title: IWSLT

dcterms:creator: M. Cettolo
M. Federico
L. Bentivogli
N. Jan
S. Stüker
K. Sudoh
K. Yoshino
C. Federmann
dcterms:description: The IWSLT-b dataset features a chain of pivots connecting multiple languages, allowing for translation in various directions.
dcterms:title: IWSLT-b

dcterms:creator: Z. Lin
X. Pan
M. Wang
X. Qiu
J. Feng
H. Zhou
L. Li
dcterms:description: The PC-6 dataset is extracted from the PC-32 corpus and includes unbalanced data across different language pairs, supporting multiple supervised and zero-shot translation directions.
dcterms:title: PC-6

dcterms:creator: H. Schwenk
V. Chaudhary
S. Sun
H. Gong
F. Guzmán
dcterms:description: The OPUS-7 dataset is extracted from the OPUS-100 corpus and includes diverse language pairs from different families, supporting multiple supervised and zero-shot translation directions.
dcterms:title: OPUS-7
